title: [K-12] Transfer Learning of Rhetorical Reasoning Strategies in Academic Texts

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced English reading comprehension and basic understanding of rhetoric
context.additional_context: Strategy transfer training between academic texts and creative genres for language majors

learning_goals: Learners can perform rhetorical reasoning with 85% accuracy in academic English texts
Learners can apply inferential strategies acquired in L2 (English) to L1 (Korean) academic texts with over 70% accuracy
Learners can integrate acquired reasoning skills into the short story genre and generate three or more example analyses
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
